title: Bug 45145: Second window comes to front when using first
OB: When using the first window in Eclipse, the second window comes to the front unexpectedly, stealing focus from the first window.
EB: The second window should not come to the front unless the user explicitly clicks on it or interacts with a widget within the second window.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open Eclipse with multiple windows. 2. Perform actions in the first window, such as typing or clicking on buttons. Observe that the second window comes to the front without any user interaction.
